The implementation of the eNotify securi: which sends notifications for certain activities such as duplicate license requests or address changes, allowing license-holders to identify and resolve any unrecognized transactions.
Compliance with federal standards establ: ensuring that all licenses and ID cards meet the required security measures.
The use of polycarbonate cards and advan: such as black-and-white laser-engraved photos and ultraviolet ink, making the cards harder to copy and counterfeit.
The presence of additional security feat: including raised signatures, date of birth, expiration date, driver's license and ID numbers, and U21 marking, which can be felt when holding the cards, further enhancing their authenticity.
